transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+5% Ally Team Defense
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+5% Ally Team Defense
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Theory Refutation
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies. When an enemy is defeated, recovers Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Inflicts reduced Critical Damage for 2 turns (Ignores the targets Resilience)\nIncreases Damage

SKT_BURST_3.effect:
<color=#FFBF00>Enhanced Attack</color>
Increases Damage
Right after using this skill, does not trigger Counterattack, Revenge 
or Agile Response

description: Attacks 2 enemies. When an enemy is defeated, recovers Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000089_1]</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Disassembly Analysis
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) After attacking an enemy, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, and after defeating an enemy, increases Priority by an additional <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.

(Triggered Effect) When an ally other than the caster performs an attack that targets all enemies, steals <color=#28d9ed>1</color> buff(s) from the enemy with the highest Max Health and then attacks the target. (Ignores the target’s Resilience.)
This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
description:
(Passive Effect) After attacking an enemy, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, and after defeating an enemy, increases Priority by an additional <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.

(Triggered Effect) When an ally other than the caster performs an attack that targets all enemies, steals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000089_2_6]</color> buff(s) from the enemy with the highest Max Health and then attacks the target. (Ignores the targetâs Resilience.)
This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Final Cleanup
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies.
This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack and ignores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.

When attacking <color=#ffd732>Irregulars</color>, <color=#28d9ed>completely</color> ignores the target’s Defense and reduces all skill cooldowns of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.
description:
Attacks all enemies.
This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack and ignores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.

When attacking <color=#ffd732>Irregulars</color>, <color=#28d9ed>completely</color> ignores the targetâs Defense and reduces all skill cooldowns of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, reduces skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Final Cleanup</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, reduces skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Final Cleanup</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000089_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
